tags.name: Flights
tags.description: In this section you can find all of the endpoints related to live and historical flight data

tags.name: Aircraft
tags.description: In this section you can find all of the endpoints related to aircraft data, such as tail number, ICAO type, owner (company), serial number or first flight. You can also find statistics of flight hours and most used airports

tags.name: Airports
tags.description: In this section you can find all of the endpoints related to global airport data. You can get details of specific airports (by ICAO or IATA code) as well as searching by country, city, or latitude/longitude. You will get access to static information such as codes, cities, countries, elevation, time zone and list of runways as well as real-time informations (e.g runway in use; recent takeoff/landing statistics)

tags.name: Airspace
tags.description: In this section you can find all of the endpoints related to global airspace data - NAT/PAC Tracks or

tags.name: Statistics
tags.description: General statistics of air traffic, airports and aircraft

tags.name: Billing
tags.description: Utilities for consulting realtime billing information (e.g. credit used in the current cycle, requests detail, daily statistics, etc)

get.description: Use this endpoint if you are looking for details or statistics for a specific aircraft (find by Mode-S hex code or tail number)
Use this endpoint if you want to list all aircraft of a specific ICAO type or company
Use this endpoint if you are trying to find all airports in a country, city or within a specific region.
Use this endpoint if you know exactly which airport you need to know details for - you can search by ICAO or IATA code.

ATIS (Automatic Terminal Information Service) is a service that continuously broadcasts aeronautical information around the airport. D-ATIS is the text transcription of the information provided by it. Use this endpoint to find the latest information for a specific airport.
METARs (METeorological Aerodrome Reports) provide a report of the current weather conditions in the vicinity of an aerodrome. Use this endpoint to get the most up-to-date METAR information.

TAF (Terminal Aerodrome Forecast) is a weather forecast information service provided by airports to serve the surrounding air traffic. TAF reports are updated several times throughout the day to ensure that pilots have access to the most up-to-date information as possible. You can use this endpoint to get the latest weather information for a specific airport.
The North Atlantic Tracks are high altitude routes across the atlantic between Western Europe and North America. The tracks are updated daily. Use this endpoint to get the most up-to-date tracks

Pacific Organized Track System describes the set of routes across the Pacific between Hawaii or North America and Japan/South-east Asia - updated on a daily basis. Use this endpoint to get the most up-to-date information.
NOTAMs (NOtice To AirMen) are a way of local aviation authorities alerting pilots of potential hazards. Use this endpoint if you want to see the alerts that are relevant for a specific airport.
Use this endpoint if you woould like to view details on the current usage of credit in your account

get.summary: Get the latest token usage statistics
get.description: Use this endpoint if you would like to view the latest usage of your token

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Show usage from this date only

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Show usage to this date only

post.description: Use this endpoint if you are interested in knowing which flights have flown over a particular geographical area at a given point in time
Use this endpoint if your goal is to get real time information for live flights, either if you are looking for a specific geographical location or particular aircraft/airline/airport.

get.description: Use this endpoint if you want to know schedules of future flights

parameters.name: fromAirport
parameters.description: Request only flights departing from this airport (IATA/ICAO)

parameters.name: toAirport
parameters.description: Request only flights arriving to this airport (IATA/ICAO)

parameters.name: airline
parameters.description: Request only flights for this airline

parameters.name: departureFromDate
parameters.description: Request only flights that depart from this date onwards

parameters.name: departureToDate
parameters.description: Request only flights that depart until this date

parameters.name: arrivalFromDate
parameters.description: Request only flights that arrive from this date onwards

parameters.name: arrivalToDate
parameters.description: Request only flights that arrive until this date

post.description: Use this endpoint for general flight searches - past, present or future (scheduled) - based on departure/arrival location or individual flights and tail numbers. The search always needs to be restricted by date (either departure, arrival or both).

ApiTaf.title: TAF (Terminal Aerodrome Forecast)

validFrom.title: Time from which the report is valid

validUntil.title: Time until which the report is valid

forecast.title: List of forecasts for different time slots

ApiTaf.description: Weather forecast Information provided by airports to serve the surrounding air traffic. TAF reports are updated several times throughout the day to ensure that pilots have access to the most up-to-date information as possible

validFom.title: Time from which the forecast is valid

validUntil.title: Time until which the forecast is valid

ApiTafForecast.description: Single forecast with a valid to and from date/time

cloudBase.title: Cloud base (in ft Above Ground Level)

departureDelayReason.title: Departure delay reason
enum: 9: Scheduled ground time less than declared minimum ground time
12: Late check-in - congestion in check-in area
13: Check-in error - congestion in check-in area
15: Boarding - discrepancies and paging missing checked-in passenger
16: Commercial publicity/passenger convenience - VIP, press, ground meals and missing personal items
17: Catering order - late or incorrect order given to supplier
31: Aircraft documentation late/inaccurate - weight and balance general declaration pax manifest etc
32: Loading/unloading - bulky special load cabin load lack of loading staff
33: Loading equipment - lack of or breakdown e.g. container pallet loader lack of staff
34: Servicing equipment - lack of or breakdown lack of staff e.g. steps
39: Technical equipment - lack of or breakdown lack of staff e.g. pushback
45: Aog spares - to be carried to another station
47: Standby aircraft - lack of planned standby aircraft for technical reasons
51: Damage during flight operations - bird or lightning strike, turbulence, heavy or overweight landing, collision during taxiing
52: Damage during ground operations - collisions (other than during taxiing), loading/off-loading damage, contamination, towing, extreme weather conditions
61: Flight plan - late completion or change of flight documentation
63: Late crew procedures - other than connection and standby (flight deck or entire crew)
64: Flight desk crew shortage - sickness, awaiting standby, flight time limitations, crew meals, valid visa, health documents, etc
65: Flight deck crew special request - not within operational requirements
66: Late cabin crew boarding or departure procedures - other than connection and standby
67: Cabin crew shortage - sickness, awaiting standby, flight time limitations, crew meals, valid visa, health documents, etc
68: Cabin crew error or special request - not within operational requirements
69: Captain request for security check - extraordinary
75: De-icing of aircraft - Removal of ice and/or snow frost prevention equipment
76: Removal of snow ice water and sand from airport
77: Ground handling impaired by adverse weather conditions
81: ATFM due to ATC en-route demand/capacity - standard demand/capacity problems

82: ATFM due to ATC staff / equipment en-route - reduced capacity caused by industrial action or staff shortage or equipment failure, extraordinary demand due to capacity reduction in neighbouring area

83: ATFM due to restriction at destination airport - airport and/or runway closed due to obstruction, industrial action, staff shortage, political unrest, noise abatement, night curfew, special flights
84: ATFM due to weather at destination
87: Airport facilities - parking stands, ramp congestion, lighting, buildings, gate limitations, etc
88: Restrictions at airport of destination - airport and/or runway closed due to obstruction, industrial action, staff shortage, political unrest, noise abatement, night curfew, special flights

89: Restrictions at airport of departure with or without ATFM restrictions - incl. Air Traf. Svcs, startup/pushbk, apt and/or runwy closed due to obstruction/weather, industl. actn, staff shortage, political unrest, noise abatement, night curfew, special flts
91: Load connection - awaiting load from another flight
92: Through check-in error - passenger and baggage
93: Aircraft rotation - late arrival of aircraft from another flight or previous sector
94: Cabin crew rotation - awaiting cabin crew from another flight
95: Crew rotation - awaiting crew from another flight (flight desk or entire crew)
96: Operational control - rerouting diversion consolidation aircraft change for reason other than technical
98: Industrial action outside own airline - excluding A.T.S.
99: This code shall be used only when it is clear that a reason cannot be matched to any other code

departureDelayDetail.title: Departure delay detail
enum: OUT - Departed out of the gate

ApiDatis.title: D-ATIS (Data link - Automatic Terminal Information Service)

body.title: Message body
body.example: -  JFK ATIS INFO O 1051Z. 06011KT 10SM FEW075 SCT100 BKN210 16/07 A3008 (THREE ZERO ZERO EIGHT). APPROACH IN USE ILS RY 4R, ILS RY 4L. DEPG RY 4L. NOTAMS... JFK VOR OTS. FDC NOTAMS NATIONALLY UNAVAILABLE UFN. BIRD ACTIVITY VICINITY ARPT. NUM CRANES OPERATING AT JFK. READBACK ALL RWY HOLD SHORT INSTRUCTIONS. ...ADVS YOU HAVE INFO O.

ApiDatis.description: ATIS is a service that continuously broadcasts aeronautical information around the airport. D-ATIS is the text transcription of the information provided by it.
